attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As Christians who are fed up with multi faith policies being pushed on us by successive governments, we are taking a stand to voice our opposition to a new mega mosque on the grounds that it infringes our rights to be a Christian Nation serving one God One Faith and one Queen. The mega mosque proposals are an insult to our culture and anathema to our Christian values and beliefs.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
